column5: Well after 3 years of trying to catch trout with a bobber/float Ive decide it just is not my deal so switched back to a spoon with the 13 footer and tagged 3 of these inside 30 min. I no why I hate boober fishing it just dosent turn my yaya. So in case you thought all I do is complain no I do fish just to much effort to post pictures sorry team no sign  Peter
Nice fish Peter! You can't beat spoon chucking for spring Browns, they're hungry fish keyed in on inshore bait schools.
I just like the slam on a moving target better then a bobber plus my ADHD wont allow me to sit and watch a bobber for to long
Peter caught a fish!!! ... in some weird wave pool... lol
